name: AntiSplashStealer
description: This Discord bot prevents skyblock splash stealer userbots from logging your splashers.

GUILD_ID.description: The id of the server where the bot should prevent stealing splashes.

PUBLIC_CHANNEL.description: The public channel where the splashers are gonna be posted, your splashers should not directly send messages there.

PUBLIC_BRIDGE_CHANNEL.description: This is the place where all messages will be sent to PUBLIC_CHANNEL.

PUBLIC_CHANNEL_WEBHOOK.description: This is the URL of the webhook in the public channel.

SPLASH_ROLE.description: The splash role which is pinged every time a splash is announced.

SPLASHER_ROLE.description: This is the role that your splashers will have.
